item.name: Millers Samphire
item.description: One of the smallest wineries in Australia offering wine for sale; pottery also helps. Tom Miller has one of the more interesting and diverse CVs, with an early interest in matters alcoholic leading to the premature but happy death of a laboratory rat at Adelaide University and his enforced switch from biochemistry to mechanical engineering. The Riesling is a high-flavoured wine with crushed herb and lime aromas and flavours. The last vintage to be sold (once bottled) will be 2004; '03 is the current vintage and yes, this is as at 2007.
